name: Thunderous Kick
description: You overwhelm the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. Make a melee attack against a target in range, dealing 2d8 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit. On a hit, the target must make a CON save against your Move DC, being knocked prone and knocked back up to 15 ft on failure.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
